hotels.name: Portonovi
hotels.desc: Luxury Adriatic resort, Montenegro's hidden gem, breathtaking coastline views
hotels.longDesc: A luxurious Adriatic Coast resort that embodies Montenegro's perfect blend of breathtaking coastline, rugged mountains, and charming character‚Äîan untouched yet refined destination.

hotels.name: One&Only Portonovi
hotels.desc: Luxury Adriatic resort, guided mountain hikes, world-class dining, wellness pioneer
hotels.longDesc: An exceptional one-off resort at the entrance of Boka Bay on Europe's 'New Riviera', offering guided mountain adventures balanced with chic waterfront relaxation and pioneering wellness experiences.

hotels.name: Heritage Grand Perast
hotels.desc: Luxury 5-star hotel, waterfront elegance, Adriatic views, heritage charm
hotels.longDesc: A luxury waterfront hotel in the historic Bay of Kotor town of Perast, offering 5-star accommodations with stunning Adriatic Sea views and refined Mediterranean hospitality.

hotels.name: Mamula Island by Banyan Tree
hotels.desc: Luxury private island fortress, holistic spa, three pools, private beach, carved stone rooms
hotels.longDesc: Europe's first Banyan Tree opens on a private fortress island at Boka Bay's mouth. Thirty-two keys featuring stone rooms with modern lines, holistic spa, three pools, and pristine private beach awaits discovery.

hotels.name: Aman Sveti Stefan
hotels.desc: Iconic island resort, Adriatic views, exclusive beach access, family suites
hotels.longDesc: A legendary clifftop resort perched on a private island, offering families an unforgettable Mediterranean escape with pristine beaches and world-class amenities.
hotels.address: Villa Milocer, Aman, Sveti Stefan 85315, Montenegro

hotels.name: Apartment Kotor
hotels.desc: Budget-friendly Old Town lodging, charming medieval setting, walking distance to attractions
hotels.longDesc: Comfortable apartments nestled in Kotor's enchanting medieval Old Town, perfect for families seeking authentic charm without the luxury price tag and easy access to local sights.
hotels.address: Stari Grad Kotor 279, Kotor, 85330, Kotor 85330, Montenegro

restaurants.desc: Waterfront seafood restaurant, fresh catch daily, family-style dining, bay views
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved family-run konoba serving authentic Montenegrin seafood with views of the stunning Bay of Kotor, where generations have gathered for traditional meals and local hospitality.

restaurants.name: Karamela
restaurants.desc: Charming cafe, homemade sweets, local pastries, kid-approved treats, cozy atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: A delightful family-owned cafe in Budva's Old Town offering handmade candies, pastries, and coffee drinks that locals and children adore, perfect for a sweet afternoon break.

experiences.name: Boka Bay
experiences.desc: UNESCO fjord landscape, storybook towns, mountain-to-sea natural wonders
experiences.longDesc: A stunning natural harbor on the Adriatic featuring picturesque medieval towns nestled against dramatic mountains, offering immersive cultural tours and fresh-air adventures.

experiences.name: Balkans scenic train routes
experiences.desc: Balkan engineering marvels, dramatic gorges, mountain crossings, historic trade routes, breathtaking vistas
experiences.longDesc: Traverse remarkable engineering feats through Balkan terrain, where rail lines navigate dramatic gorges and impossible landscapes once considered impossible to cross by train.
experiences.address: 3rd Floor, Bulevardi D√´shmor√´t e Kombit Twin Towers, Tower 2, Tiran√´ 1001, Albania

experiences.name: Montenegro
experiences.desc: Stunning Balkan country with dramatic coastlines and mountain vistas
experiences.longDesc: A Balkan jewel featuring dramatic Adriatic coastlines, mountain landscapes, and the stunning Kotor Bay. A destination worthy of extensive discussion.

experiences.name: Adriatic Coast
experiences.desc: Montenegro's Adriatic coast, scenic beaches, fewer crowds, coastal charm
experiences.longDesc: Discover Montenegro's stunning Adriatic shoreline as a serene alternative to crowded Mediterranean tourist destinations. Offering dramatic coastlines and authentic coastal charm with fewer visitors.

experiences.name: Ostrog Orthodox Monastery
experiences.desc: Ancient cliffside monastery, spiritual pilgrimage site, panoramic mountain views, cultural icon
experiences.longDesc: One of Europe's most dramatic monasteries carved into a cliff, offering families breathtaking views, rich spiritual history, and an unforgettable hiking experience through Montenegro's interior.

experiences.name: Ethnographic Museum of Montenegro
experiences.desc: National heritage museum, traditional crafts, royal artifacts, educational cultural exhibits
experiences.longDesc: A fascinating museum showcasing Montenegro's rich cultural heritage through traditional costumes, weapons, and artifacts, offering families an engaging dive into the nation's captivating history.

experiences.name: Saint Nicholas‚Äô Church
experiences.desc: Historic baroque church with bell tower offering panoramic bay views

experiences.name: Our Lady of the Rocks
experiences.desc: Man-made island with baroque church and maritime museum, 10-minute boat ride

experiences.name: Saint Tryphon's Cathedral
experiences.desc: UNESCO-listed Old Town with Romanesque cathedral, maze-like alleys, and historic squares

experiences.name: Mogren beach
experiences.desc: Popular sandy beach near Budva Old Town, accessible by coastal path

experiences.name: Old Town of Budva

experiences.name: Sveti Stefan view point

kidFriendly.name: Blue Beach (Jaz / Budva)
kidFriendly.desc: Golden sandy beach, shallow family areas, beach bars, stunning mountain backdrop
kidFriendly.longDesc: Montenegro's most popular sandy beach, ideal for families with safe shallow waters, plenty of amenities, and the dramatic Lovƒáen mountain as a stunning natural backdrop for beach days.

kidFriendly.name: Cats Of Kotor
kidFriendly.desc: Quirky museum dedicated to Kotor's famous cat population, delightful for young children

markets.desc: Local produce market, fresh fruits, vegetables, regional specialties, authentic vendors
markets.longDesc: A vibrant traditional market in Podgorica's heart where families can experience local food culture, sample fresh Montenegrin produce, and interact with passionate regional vendors.

a.name: Montenegro's Bay of Kotor & Beaches: A Family Adventure (8 Days)
a.description: Discover fairytale coastal towns, island fortresses, and golden beaches along Montenegro's stunning Adriatic coast‚Äîperfectly paced for little explorers.
